document.docAuthor: Oscar Akio Shibatta & Carla Simone Pavanelli
document.masterDocTitle: Description of a new Batrochoglanis species (Siluriformes, Pseudopimelodidae) from the rio Paraguai basin, State of Mato Grosso, Brazil.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Description of a new Batrochoglanis species (Siluriformes, Pseudopimelodidae) from the rio Paraguai basin, State of Mato Grosso, Brazil.
